org.ietf.ldap
Interface LDAPReferralHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
LDAPAuthHandler, LDAPBindHandler
public interface LDAPReferralHandler

Shared ancestor to the two types of referral objects - LDAPBind and LDAPRebind.

See Also:
